card.name: Terror Pit
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Dulanzames, Jet-Black War Demon
card.text: ■ Gravity Zero ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all creatures in your graveyard to your hand. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Hyperspatial Emperor Hole
card.text: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature gets -2000 power until the End Step ■ Put a Darkness psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Dias Zeta, the Temporal Suppressor
card.text: ■ Annihilating Soul Recall 4 ''(Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose 4 cards from your opponent's graveyard, your graveyard, or 4 cards from both graveyards. Put the chosen cards on the bottom of their owner's deck in any order. For each 4 cards chosen, you may use the following Icon ■ Double Breaker ■ Awaken—End Step

card.name: Diabolos Zeta, Annihilation Awakened
card.text: ■ Quattro Breaker ■ Each of your opponent's creatures gets -5000 power. ■ Each of your other creatures gets +5000 power. ■ Release

card.name: Hyperspatial Romanov Hole
card.text: ■ Your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. ■ Put a Darkness psychic creature that costs 10 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ■ Hyperspatial Psychic

card.name: Black Ganveet, Temporal Wicked Soldier
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures. ■ Awaken—At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent has no cards in their hand, Darkness Ganveet, the Assassin Awakened

card.name: Darkness Ganveet, the Assassin Awakened
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it, then chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Jenny, the Suicide Doll
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, you may destroy this creature. If you do, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

card.name: Death Gate, Gate of Hell
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. You may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Thunder Blade, Wolf Tiger
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Zabi Barrel, Western Doll
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Bone Dance Charger
card.text: ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ Charger

card.name: Batou Shoulder, Shadow of Fiction
card.text: ■ Your opponent's spells cost 1 more to cast for each spell in their graveyard.

card.name: Necrodragon Abayo Shabayo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy one of your creatures. If you do, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

card.name: Diabolos, Prison Dragon Blade
card.text: ■ When you put this dragheart, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. ■ Dragsolution ■ Hyperspatial Dragheart

card.name: Diajigoku, Annihilation Demon Dragon
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -1000 power for each darkness card in your graveyard until the End Step ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Uroborof, Dragon Ruler
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a darkness dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. ''(If it's a Dragheart Weapon ■ Slayer

card.name: Discald, Misfortune Demon Sickle

card.name: Dokurocald, Misfortune Demon Dragon

card.name: Ganaldonal, Wrath Demon Dragon
